game.name: Supraland Six Inches Under
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 포탈, 젤다 그리고 메트로이드의 혼합. 탐험, 퍼즐, 전투! 1인칭 메트로이드배니아 수프라랜드의 6인치 아래에서.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A mix between Portal, Zelda and Metroid. Exploration, puzzles, combat! A first-person-metroidvania taking place six inches under Supraland.

reviewHighlights.text: In short, this spin-off is more polished than the first, with great music and art design. However, I couldn't help but feel that the puzzles were more...
It's a pretty fun game, but the story reads like some Redditor's screed on Trickle Down Economics. Skip it and focus on the puzzles and you'll have a...
